newsitem.title: USA: Colorocs president, COO McKeon resigns.
newsitem.headline: Colorocs president, COO McKeon resigns.

text.p: Colorocs Information Technologies Inc said on Monday that its president and chief operating officer, Alan McKeon, has resigned to pursue new ventures.
McKeon remains a Colorocs director, the company said.
McKeon also resigned as president and chief executive of ViewCall America, a Colorocs majority-owned subsidiary bought by NetChannel Inc, a privately held firm based in South San Francisco, Calif.
That sale recently closed, Colorocs said. ViewCall is an Internet TV system. NetChannel plans to provide Internet access via the television.
Colorocs said its chairman and chief executive, Rudolph Russo, will assume McKeon's duties at that company.
